javadoc: A container class to hold ELF symbols.

methods.name: createElfSymbolTable
methods.comment: Create and parse an Elf symbol table

params.name: symbolTableSection
params.comment: string table section header or null if associated with a dynamic table entry

params.name: addrOffset
params.comment: memory address of symbol table (should already be adjusted for prelink)

params.name: length
params.comment: length of symbol table in bytes of -1 if unknown

params.name: entrySize
params.comment: size of each symbol entry in bytes

params.name: isDynamic
params.comment: true if symbol table is the dynamic symbol table

methods.javadoc: DO NOT USE THIS CONSTRUCTOR, USE create*(GenericFactory ...) FACTORY METHODS INSTEAD.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: DO NOT USE THIS CONSTRUCTOR, USE create*(GenericFactory ...) FACTORY METHODS INSTEAD.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this is the dynamic symbol table
@return true if this is the dynamic symbol table
methods.name: isDynamic
methods.comment: Returns true if this is the dynamic symbol table

return.comment: true if this is the dynamic symbol table

methods.javadoc:
Returns the associated string table section.
@return the associated string table section
methods.name: getStringTable
methods.comment: Returns the associated string table section.

methods.javadoc:
Returns all of the symbols defined in this symbol table.
@return all of the symbols defined in this symbol table
methods.name: getSymbols
methods.comment: Returns all of the symbols defined in this symbol table.

return.comment: all of the symbols defined in this symbol table

methods.name: getSymbolIndex
methods.comment:
Returns the index of the specified symbol in this
 symbol table.

return.comment: the index of the specified symbol

methods.name: getSymbolAt
methods.comment: Returns the symbol at the specified address.

return.comment: the symbol at the specified address

methods.javadoc:
Returns all of the global symbols.
@return all of the global symbols
methods.name: getGlobalSymbols
methods.comment: Returns all of the global symbols.

methods.javadoc:
Returns all of the sources file names.
@return all of the sources file names
methods.name: getSourceFiles
methods.comment: Returns all of the sources file names.

return.comment: all of the sources file names

methods.javadoc:
Adds the specified symbol into this symbol table.
@param symbol the new symbol to add
methods.name: addSymbol
methods.comment: Adds the specified symbol into this symbol table.

methods.name: getTableSectionHeader
methods.comment:
Get the section header which corresponds to this table, or null
 if only associated with a dynamic table entry

return.comment: symbol table section header or null

name: ElfSymbolTable
comment: A container class to hold ELF symbols.
